entry.title: Freckled Sage DIY Chalk Runner Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oilcloth by the Yard
Type: Kits
Price: 26.00

This Kit, designed by Freckled Sage, makes one Chalk Runner!

Perfect  use for all of your holidays. Includes one liquid chalk marker that dries quickly and won't erase or rub off without water. Perfect for labeling buffets, place settings, wine and cheese, the uses are endless. It also has a retro feel, so it's perfect as a gift for hostess, student, busy kids!

Put one on your dining room table, use one on the kids table to keep them occupied. Use it to leave a note for Santa, dorm rooms, holiday banner.

Includes, fabric, instructions and one liquid chalk marker(works with regular chalk too) to make one runner approx 14"x 72"

Perfect for the holidays, easy to make and use! Sewing optional! Perfect for hostess gift, great for dorms, holiday tables, etc

DIY Kit Chalk Runner with Marker $25.00

entry.title: Freckled Sage DIY Christmas Placemats or Runner Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oilcloth By The Yard
Type: Kits
Price: 12.95

This kit designed by Freckled Sage,  provides enough fabric and instructions to make 2 finished double sided placemats or one double-sided runner!

Perfect for hostess gift or your holiday table! Easy sewing instructions, perfect DIY kit for Teens!

Requires minimal sewing skills!

Choose from:

Christmas Stars on Red with Dot Gold

Christmas Stars on Green with Red Gingham

Christmas Stars on Green with Red Dot

Christmas Stars on Blue with Gold Gingham

$12.00 per kit

While Supplies Last
